title: WTB Vigilante & Verdict enduro tires get updated tread + SG2 MTB Protection!
content:
When it comes to choosing the right tire, you often have a choice. Do you pick the overbuilt tire to prevent flats? Or do you opt for the lighter, more supple tire and take your chances? It would be great if there was some middle ground, right? That’s exactly what WTB’s SG2 protection seems to

The post WTB Vigilante & Verdict enduro tires get updated tread + SG2 MTB Protection! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
